role.descr: more specific destination, if in addition to ARG1

example.text: He had already had radiation therapy to the pelvis for a previous cancer.
example.amr: (r2 / radiate-02 :ARG1 (h / he) :ARG3 (a / anatomical-site :name (n5 / name :op1 "pelvis")) :ARG4 (c / cancer-03) :mod (p / previous)) :mod (a4 / already))
